scripts.dev: echo 'Choose a platform to run: auth-service, blood-platform, complaint-platform, traffic-platform, web-frontend'
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:blood" "npm run dev:complaint" "npm run dev:traffic" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:auth && npm run install:blood && npm run install:complaint && npm run install:traffic && npm run install:web
scripts.test: npm run test:auth && npm run test:blood && npm run test:complaint && npm run test:architecture && npm run test:traffic && npm run test:web
scripts.build: npm run build:auth && npm run build:blood && npm run build:complaint && npm run build:architecture && npm run build:web
